user_input: A 70-year-old male with a 40 pack-year smoking history presents with chronic productive cough
ground_truth_output: progressive dyspnea, and recurrent respiratory infections. Spirometry shows FEV1/FVC < 0.7 and FEV1 45% of predicted.,Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD)

user_input: A 30-year-old female presents with episodic palpitations
ground_truth_output: tremors, weight loss despite increased appetite, heat intolerance, and anxiety. Examination reveals tachycardia, fine tremor, and exophthalmos. TSH is suppressed and free T4 is elevated.,Graves' disease
sore throat, tender cervical lymphadenopathy, and tonsillar exudates. Rapid strep test is positive. No cough or rhinorrhea is present.,Streptococcal pharyngitis (Strep throat)
